title: ATSC 3 DRM Update: Let's Navigate the Zinwell Player's Arduous Update Process
description:
See my prior Zinwell videos: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SAJ_a2znnn0&list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvrPh55RuFfsX6qMOmU2iSe - ATSC 3 DRM brings with it frequent updates and a ton of complexity for people least able to deal with complicated technology. The Zinwell player we reviewed a few weeks ago received an update that they say simplifies its update process. Let's take a look. 

Links:

IR Blaster: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4MJu_64vuv4
The Antenna Man's Video on OTA 4k: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e_94q9TCCDY
FCC Petition Instructions: http://lon.tv/fccinstructions


VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
02:22 - Update Process
04:28 - Update Result
05:28 - Verifying Update
06:42 - New Update Process
07:55 - Conclusion
